titleStmt.title: 2nd Indiana Cavalry Regiment (41st Regiment Indiana Volunteers) (U.S.A.)

availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

org.orgName: 2nd Indiana Cavalry Regiment (41st Regiment Indiana Volunteers) (U.S.A.)

body.p: Organized at Indianapolis, Indiana, on September 20, 1861. Mustered out at Nashville, Tennessee, on July 12, 1865. Also known as the 41st Regiment Volunteers. Commander(s): John A. Bridgland, Robert N. Hudson, Edward M. McCook, James W. Stewart.

ab.bibl: Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Indiana, vol. 2, 1861-1865 (Indianapolis: W. R. Holloway, State Printer, 1865), 400, 411-12.
